actionsandpool.action.scheduler

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • actionsandpool.action.Action
      • actionsandpool.action.scheduler.Scheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FairScheduler, SequentialScheduler

    public abstract class Scheduler
extends Action
    A Scheduler is an action that owns a set of actions. You can use a scheduler to make progress these actions.
